title: About
text:
This website serves as a documentation of my journey in NM2207: Computational Media Literacy, taken in AY23/24 Semester 1. On this webpage, I am excited to share my journey of learning the R programming language with you!

Weekly Progress
In the Assignments page, I compiled all the Challenges and Code-alongs that I completed in NM2207 from weeks 1 to 9. The documents will be organized by week, where each week consists of a Code-along, where I followed coding practices from lecture videos, and a Challenge, where I completed coding questions. Feel free to explore my work!
In the Final Project page, I complied each week’s documentation for the final project, from weeks 9 to 13.


Conclusion
Thank you for visiting and following along with my journey! \ʕ ·ᴥ· ʔ/

title: Greenhouse Gas Emissions Trends
text:
Introduction
In this data story, we will be putting our focus on the exploration of greenhouse gas emissions data, spanning from 2010 to 2021. The overarching goal is to uncover the driving forces behind changes in greenhouse gas emissions and understand how these factors exhibit variation.
This analytical endeavor carries significant weight in addressing environmental impacts, economic implications, and providing the foundation for well-informed policy making in the ongoing global effort to combat climate change.


Data
We will be analyzing Greenhouse Gas Emissions Trends based on:

Industry


# read csv file
data <- read.csv("Annual_Greenhouse_Gas_(GHG)_Air_Emissions_Accounts.csv")
distinct(data,Industry)

                                                              Industry
1                                    Agriculture, Forestry and Fishing
2                                                         Construction
3                  Electricity, Gas, Steam and Air Conditioning Supply
4                                                        Manufacturing
5                                                               Mining
6                                            Other Services Industries
7                                                     Total Households
8                                        Total Industry and Households
9                                           Transportation and Storage
10 Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities



Region


distinct(data,Country)

                             Country
1                 Advanced Economies
2                             Africa
3                           Americas
4                               Asia
5          Australia and New Zealand
6                       Central Asia
7                       Eastern Asia
8                     Eastern Europe
9  Emerging and Developing Economies
10                            Europe
11                               G20
12                                G7
13   Latin America and the Caribbean
14                   Northern Africa
15                  Northern America
16                   Northern Europe
17                           Oceania
18                South-eastern Asia
19                     Southern Asia
20                   Southern Europe
21                Sub-Saharan Africa
22                      Western Asia
23                    Western Europe
24                             World


For simplicity and to make the analysis more focused, we will only be focusing on geographic regions:
Africa, Americas, Asia, Europe, Oceania

Gas types


distinct(data,Gas_Type)

           Gas_Type
1    Carbon dioxide
2 Fluorinated gases
3    Greenhouse gas
4           Methane
5     Nitrous oxide




Analysis
